page.title: 05RELIGION IN BETTYHILL
page.content: There are two churches in Bettyhill - the Church of Scotland and the Free Church of Scotland. They are situated near each other in the centre of the village. The Reverend Clifford Rennie, minister of the Church of Scotland has a very large parish stretching twenty five miles from Bettyhill to Altnaharra. In addition to preaching at the Church of Farr, in our village, he takes services in Altnaharra and Strathnaver each Sunday. The Free Church minister is the Reverend Andrew Fraser from Edinburgh who was previusly a missionary in Peru. He has an even larger area to cover and is responsible for Free Church Congregations in Tongue, Farr, Strahty and Halladale.
